title: 30-50 FPS during team fights, 100 without team fight, but I have a good graphics card? [MAC]
body:
Can a Rioter help me out here

https://prnt.sc/gpzr5q

Those are my specs, and I'd assume those are more than enough to get at least a steady 60 FPS during team fights, but I don't

And my settings aren't that high, everything is on medium, and I have shadows turned off

replies.body: There could be some bad game assets struggling to render the game, or incorrect settings.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, and test it in a custom game.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your issue!
